text: o NUMBERS ARENOT MEANT T0 BE PUT INTO FUNNY BOXES © YEARS OF GRINDING yet NO REAL-WORLD USE FOUND for US MORTALS ANYWAYS © Wanted to RAISEMATRIGES T0 HIGH POWERS ?
